titles.title: Raising a question of the privileges of the House.

action.text: Mr. McGovern moved to table the measure.
On motion to table the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 219 - 193 (Roll no. 128).

bill.summary: 3/12/2008--Introduced. Directs the Committee on Standards of Official Conduct to investigate without further delay violations of House rules by Representative Dave Obey and report its findings and recommendations to the House, including a recommendation regarding the appropriate action for such violations.
